name: James O'CONNOR, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: O'Connor v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: James O’CONNOR, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of October, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1043
James O’CONNOR, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 117 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 4, 2012.
